todos.title: Server: validate lobby voice
todos.description: Add server-side validation for lobby voice session creation, user auth, rate limits, and safe-room checks.

todos.title: Client: lobby voice UI
todos.description: Add lobby UI controls to start/stop voice, show connection state, mic mute, and participant list.

todos.title: Tests: voice lobby integration
todos.description: Add unit and integration tests for voice signaling, reconnection, permission errors, and UI state transitions.

todos.title: Voice UX polish
todos.description: Polish UX (icons, toasts), accessibility (aria labels), and performance (lazy init) for lobby voice.

todos.title: Server: validate avatar URLs
todos.description: Validate avatar uploads/URLs, sanitize inputs, enforce size and content rules, and provide fallback avatar data.

todos.title: Client: show avatars in lobby
todos.description: Display player avatars in lobby, add upload/change flow, and provide graceful fallbacks for missing avatars.

todos.title: Tests: avatar flows
todos.description: Add tests for avatar display, fallback behaviour, upload validation, and URL-safety checks.

todos.title: Avatar styling polish
todos.description: Polish avatar sizes, caching, placeholder animations, and responsive layout in the lobby.

todos.title: Server: expose cached stats
todos.description: Add/validate API for returning cached player stats, enforce freshness rules, and ensure auth/permissions.

todos.title: Client: show cached stats
todos.description: Display cached player stats in lobby player cards with visual indicators for staleness and loading state.

todos.title: Tests: cached stats
todos.description: Add tests for cached stats endpoints, staleness handling, client display, and error scenarios.

todos.title: Stats UX polish
todos.description: Polish stats formatting, tooltips, telemetry for cache hits/misses, and fallback behaviors.
